publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-886 Scott Barrie on behalf of the Selection Panel: Appointment of the Commissioner for Children and Young People in Scotland-That the Parliament nominates Kathleen Marshall to Her Majesty The Queen for appointment as the Commissioner for Children and Young People in Scotland. Supported by: Robert Brown*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S2M-886 Appointment of the Commissioner for Children and Young People in Scotland (lodged on 9 February 2004) Rhona Brankin*
